lead_paragraph: Vipers have been thought to strike faster than other snakes. But new research shows that the rat snake is just as fast.

headline.print_headline: Sciencetake; A Striking Find Among Snakes
headline.main: Vipers Aren’t the Only Kings of the Quick Strike

snippet: Vipers have been thought to strike faster than other snakes. But new research shows that the rat snake is just as fast.
abstract: Researchers find rat snakes strike at prey as quickly as vipers, which were previously thought to attack more rapidly than other snakes.
